mapper.select: INSERT INTO PUBLIC.todo_list (id, title, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, last_modified_at, last_modified_by) SELECT to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD') || '-' || lpad((coalesce(max(substring(tl.id, 8, 10)::int), 0) + 1)::text, 3, '0'), #{title}, #{isDeleted}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{lastModifiedAt}, #{lastModifiedBy} FROM PUBLIC.todo_list as tl WHERE substring(tl.id, 1, 6) = to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD') RETURNING *

UPDATE PUBLIC.todo_list SET title = #{payload.title}, is_deleted = #{payload.isDeleted}, last_modified_at = #{payload.lastModifiedAt}, last_modified_by = #{payload.lastModifiedBy} WHERE id = #{id} RETURNING *
mapper.insert: insert into PUBLIC.todo_list_history (todo_list_id, history_sequence_no, todo_list_title, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, last_modified_at, last_modified_by) values (#{id}, (select coalesce(max(tlh.history_sequence_no) + 1, 0) from PUBLIC.todo_list_history tlh where tlh.todo_list_id = #{id}), #{title}, #{isDeleted}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{lastModifiedAt}, #{lastModifiedBy})

insert into PUBLIC.todo_list_history (todo_list_id, history_sequence_no, todo_list_title, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, last_modified_at, last_modified_by) values
(#{entity.id}, (select coalesce(max(tlh.history_sequence_no) + 1, 0) from PUBLIC.todo_list_history tlh where tlh.todo_list_id = #{entity.id}), #{entity.title}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.lastModifiedAt}, #{entity.lastModifiedBy})
